text: The Blue Dahlia is a 1946 American crime thriller movie directed by George Marshall and starring Alan Ladd, Veronica Lake, William Bendix, Howard Da Silva, Doris Dowling, Hugh Beaumont, Tom Powers, Howard Freeman. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1947. == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 crime movies Category:1946 thriller movies Category:1940s American crime thriller movies Category:Movies directed by George Marshall Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Infidelity in movies
title: The Blue Dahlia
